name: Shell HD4 Plus 15W-40

globalDocs.name: Shell HD4 Plus 15W-40 (CI-4 plus perf.) - India EN TDG V1.4 18-May-2023

localDocs.name: Shell HD4 Plus 15W-40 (CI-4 plus) - India India EN 140006501563 EHS V1.0 16-MAR-2020

marketing: Shell HD4 Plus adapts and protects under full range of pressures and temperatures found in modern engines.  It delivers excellent soot and viscosity control, outstanding protection against wear and exceptional versatility for multiple engine makes.
